Reviews.Title: Fast and competent
Reviews.Author: Pat Murray
Reviews.Content: Bought this laptop about a month ago and didn't know anything about Samsung computers so i asked 3 sales reps and they all said it was a great laptop and i can't disagree. Very fast and clear,has more power than my other laptops. Very light to tote around. You will need to buy an optical drive.

Reviews.Title: Good Laptop
Reviews.Author: chris maloy
Reviews.Content: This is a good laptop. I bought it from BB but it has worked well. No complaints! I would recommend this, especially for the price.

Reviews.Title: do not recommend buying the product
Reviews.Author: Olga Matatov
Reviews.Content: do not recommend buying the product. Is not reliable. I opened a box and tried to start enjoying a father without success. One-third from the keyboard did not work. I returned to the store and got a new one. I opened a box and found a different phenomenon,button on the keyboard sink. I returned the Laptop and canceled the deal.
